ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: There are supposed to be ceramic and steel staves available someday to make incredible bows. That might be one use for the pottery skill. Belgarth
ygData.messageBody:
There are supposed to be ceramic and steel staves
available someday to make incredible bows. That might
be one use for the pottery skill.

Belgarth

--- dlobdell <dlobdell@...> wrote:
> From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
>
> You have to remember that the trade skills arn't all
> dependent on each other like they will be in the
> future... I'm sure pottery will have its uses, just
> like baking ect will eventually.. You'll just have
> to wait. I play a gnome and i'd love to be able to
> tinker, but tinkering is totally bugged... So i'll
> just have to wait, and i accept that... It leaves
> something to look forward to. Untill then tinkering
> is basicly useless+ACE-
> Wes Lobdell,
> Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life
> exists elsewhere in the universe
> is that no one has bothered to make contact with
> us.+ACI-
>
> -----Original Message-----
